mapper.update: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `entries` ( `id` INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `userId` INTEGER, `habitId` INTEGER, `achieved` REAL, `date` TEXT, UNIQUE (userId, habitId, date) )
mapper.insert: insert or ignore into entries (userId, habitId, achieved, date) values (#{userId}, #{habitId}, #{achieved}, #{date})
mapper.select: select * from entries where id = #{id} limit 1
mapper.update: update entries set achieved = #{achieved} where userId = #{userId} and habitId = #{habitId} and date = #{date}
